summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4728 for the improvement of 13th Avenue North, from East Aloha Street to East Prospect Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by cosntructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 54680, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
